title: Need a font!
content: I need the font for the info box in CK 4, 5, and 6.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Need a font!
content:
Do you mean the status screen, the help screen or what? There are 3 different font styles used: the famous big blue text, used in many Keen web counters; the digital-alike score and wristwatch fonts; the text used in the help, ordering info screens etc.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

content:
You won't get far with a bitmap I fear - unless GM has a bitmap to font feature.

There is a built-in font maker for Windows... somewhere. But there IS one.------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

title: Re: Need a font!
content:
You could download Font Creator from [url=http://www.high-logic.com/]www.high-logic.com/[/url] and make a font with that.
You have 30 days until it expires.
I made my SGA font with it, and it works as well as I'd like.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten.
